Thanks for sharing the PPT deck Pradeep.

   format for all pitches, so not really needed

   overload problem. I vote for introducing the current graphic with data

   into technical capabilities in the next slide.

   personalized decision support Agent within a B2B setting  is a non-trivial
   problem where generalized LLMs can't compete directly.
